<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2"><h2 id="Honours">Honours</h2></div>
<p><b>Bayern Munich Juniors</b><sup id="cite_ref-144" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-144"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>135<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-145" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-145"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>136<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Under_17_Bundesliga" title="Under 17 Bundesliga">Under 17 Bundesliga</a>: 2001</li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Under_19_Bundesliga" title="Under 19 Bundesliga">Under 19 Bundesliga</a>: 2002</li></ul>
<p><b>Bayern Munich II</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Regionalliga_S%C3%BCd_(1994%E2%80%932012)" title="Regionalliga Süd (1994–2012)">Regionalliga Süd</a>: 2003–04</li></ul>
<p><b>Bayern Munich</b><sup id="cite_ref-Soccerway_146-0" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-Soccerway-146"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>137<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bundesliga" title="Bundesliga">Bundesliga</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2002%E2%80%9303_Bundesliga" title="2002–03 Bundesliga">2002–03</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2004%E2%80%9305_Bundesliga" title="2004–05 Bundesliga">2004–05</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2005%E2%80%9306_Bundesliga" title="2005–06 Bundesliga">2005–06</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2007%E2%80%9308_Bundesliga" title="2007–08 Bundesliga">2007–08</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2009%E2%80%9310_Bundesliga" title="2009–10 Bundesliga">2009–10</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2012%E2%80%9313_Bundesliga" title="2012–13 Bundesliga">2012–13</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2013%E2%80%9314_Bundesliga" title="2013–14 Bundesliga">2013–14</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2014%E2%80%9315_Bundesliga" title="2014–15 Bundesliga">2014–15</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DFB-Pokal" title="DFB-Pokal">DFB-Pokal</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2002%E2%80%9303_DFB-Pokal" title="2002–03 DFB-Pokal">2002–03</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2004%E2%80%9305_DFB-Pokal" title="2004–05 DFB-Pokal">2004–05</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2005%E2%80%9306_DFB-Pokal" title="2005–06 DFB-Pokal">2005–06</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2007%E2%80%9308_DFB-Pokal" title="2007–08 DFB-Pokal">2007–08</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2009%E2%80%9310_DFB-Pokal" title="2009–10 DFB-Pokal">2009–10</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2012%E2%80%9313_DFB-Pokal" title="2012–13 DFB-Pokal">2012–13</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2013%E2%80%9314_DFB-Pokal" title="2013–14 DFB-Pokal">2013–14</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DFL-Ligapokal" title="DFL-Ligapokal">DFL-Ligapokal</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2007_DFL-Ligapokal" title="2007 DFL-Ligapokal">2007</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DFL-Supercup" class="mw-redirect" title="DFL-Supercup">DFL-Supercup</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010_DFL-Supercup" title="2010 DFL-Supercup">2010</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_Champions_League" title="UEFA Champions League">UEFA Champions League</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2012%E2%80%9313_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2012–13 UEFA Champions League">2012–13</a>; runner-up: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2009%E2%80%9310_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2009–10 UEFA Champions League">2009–10</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-147" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-147"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>138<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2011%E2%80%9312_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2011–12 UEFA Champions League">2011–12</a><sup id="cite_ref-148" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-148"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>139<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<p><b>Manchester United</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FA_Cup" title="FA Cup">FA Cup</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2015%E2%80%9316_FA_Cup" title="2015–16 FA Cup">2015–16</a><sup id="cite_ref-149" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-149"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>140<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-150" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-150"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>141<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<p><b>Germany</b><sup id="cite_ref-Soccerway_146-1" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-Soccerway-146"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>137<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIFA_World_Cup" title="FIFA World Cup">FIFA World Cup</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2014_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2014 FIFA World Cup">2014</a>; third place: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2006_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2006 FIFA World Cup">2006</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2010 FIFA World Cup">2010</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_European_Championship" title="UEFA European Championship">UEFA European Championship</a>: runner-up: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_Euro_2008" title="UEFA Euro 2008">2008</a>; third place: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_Euro_2012" title="UEFA Euro 2012">2012</a><sup id="cite_ref-151" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-151"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>142<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIFA_Confederations_Cup" title="FIFA Confederations Cup">FIFA Confederations Cup</a> third place: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2005_FIFA_Confederations_Cup" title="2005 FIFA Confederations Cup">2005</a></li></ul>
<p><b>Individual</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Silbernes_Lorbeerblatt" title="Silbernes Lorbeerblatt">Silbernes Lorbeerblatt</a>: 2006, 2010, 2014<sup id="cite_ref-152" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-152"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>143<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIFA_World_Cup_awards#All-Star_Team" title="FIFA World Cup awards">FIFA World Cup Dream Team</a>: 2010<sup id="cite_ref-153" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-153"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>144<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li>FIFA World Cup top assist provider: 2010 (3, shared with <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_M%C3%BCller" title="Thomas Müller">Thomas Müller</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mesut_%C3%96zil" title="Mesut Özil">Mesut Özil</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kak%C3%A1" title="Kaká">Kaká</a>, and <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dirk_Kuyt" title="Dirk Kuyt">Dirk Kuyt</a>)</li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany_national_football_team" title="Germany national football team">Germany national team</a> Player of the Year: 2010<sup id="cite_ref-154" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-154"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>145<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/European_Sports_Media#ESM_Team_of_the_Year" title="European Sports Media">ESM Team of the Year</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/European_Sports_Media#2010s" title="European Sports Media">2012–13</a><sup id="cite_ref-155" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-155"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>146<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Footballer_of_the_Year_in_Germany" class="mw-redirect" title="Footballer of the Year in Germany">Footballer of the Year in Germany</a>: 2013<sup id="cite_ref-2013PotY_18-1" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-2013PotY-18"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>18<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-winner_2013_19-1" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-winner_2013-19"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>19<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_Best_Player_in_Europe_Award" class="mw-redirect" title="UEFA Best Player in Europe Award">UEFA Best Player in Europe Award</a>: 2013 (7th place)<sup id="cite_ref-156" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-156"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>147<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIFA_FIFPro_World_XI" class="mw-redirect" title="FIFA FIFPro World XI">FIFA FIFPro World XI</a> 3rd team: 2013<sup id="cite_ref-157" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-157"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>148<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li>FIFA FIFPro World XI 4th team: 2014<sup id="cite_ref-158" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-158"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>149<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bambi_Award" title="Bambi Award">Bambi Award</a>: 2016<sup id="cite_ref-159" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-159"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>150<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Major_League_Soccer_All-Star_Game" class="mw-redirect" title="Major League Soccer All-Star Game">MLS All-Star</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2017_MLS_All-Star_Game" title="2017 MLS All-Star Game">2017</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-160" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-160"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>151<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2019_MLS_All-Star_Game" title="2019 MLS All-Star Game">2019</a><sup id="cite_ref-161" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-161"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>152<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li>Bayern Munich Hall of Fame: 2018<sup id="cite_ref-162" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastian_Schweinsteiger#cite_note-162"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>153<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<p><b>Orders</b>

<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236075235"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Awards81" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible mw-collapsed navbox-inner mw-made-collapsible" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background:gold;color:navy;"><button type="button" class="mw-collapsible-toggle mw-collapsible-toggle-default mw-collapsible-toggle-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0" style="color: inherit;"><span class="mw-collapsible-text" style="color: inherit;">show</span></button><div id="Awards81" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em">Awards</div></th></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0;font-size:114%"><div style="padding:0px">

<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236075235"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Footballer_of_the_Year_(Germany)103" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner mw-made-collapsible mw-collapsed" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: white; color: black; border:1px solid black;"><button type="button" class="mw-collapsible-toggle mw-collapsible-toggle-default mw-collapsible-toggle-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0" style="color: inherit;"><span class="mw-collapsible-text" style="color: inherit;">show</span></button><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1239400231"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Template:German_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="Template:German Footballer of the Year"><abbr title="View this template" style="color: black">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Template_talk:German_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:German Footballer of the Year"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style="color: black">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:EditPage/Template:German_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="Special:EditPage/Template:German Footballer of the Year"><abbr title="Edit this template" style="color: black">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Footballer_of_the_Year_(Germany)103" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Footballer_of_the_Year_(Germany)" title="Footballer of the Year (Germany)"><span style="color:black;">Footballer of the Year (Germany)</span></a></div></th></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1960: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uwe_Seeler" title="Uwe Seeler">Seeler</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1961: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Max_Morlock" title="Max Morlock">Morlock</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1962: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karl-Heinz_Schnellinger" title="Karl-Heinz Schnellinger">Schnellinger</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1963: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hans_Sch%C3%A4fer" title="Hans Schäfer">Schäfer</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1964: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uwe_Seeler" title="Uwe Seeler">Seeler</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1965: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hans_Tilkowski" title="Hans Tilkowski">Tilkowski</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1966: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Franz_Beckenbauer" title="Franz Beckenbauer">Beckenbauer</a></span></li>

              --lns-unit: 8px;

              --ds-text-subtlest: #6B6E76;

              --ds-background-information-bold: #1868DB;
              --ds-background-accent-green-bolder: #1F845A;
